items.label: lem-mean-fourth-derivative
items.title: Fourth Derivative of Localized Mean
items.content:
458: :label: lem-mean-fourth-derivative
459: 
460: The localized mean $\mu_\rho[f_k, d, x_i] = \sum_{j \in A_k} w_{ij}(\rho) d(x_j)$ satisfies:
461: 
462: $$
463: \|\nabla^4_{x_i} \mu_\rho\| \le C_{\mu,\nabla^4}(\rho) = d^{(4)}_{\max} + \frac{12 d'_{\max} C_{\nabla^3 K}(\rho)}{\rho^3} + \frac{24 d''_{\max} C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho)}{\rho^2} + \frac{24 d'''_{\max} C_{\nabla K}(\rho)}{\rho} + 2 d_{\max} C_{w,4}(\rho)
464: 
465: $$

items.label: lem-reg-fourth-chain
items.title: Chain Rule for $\sigma'_{\text{reg}}$
items.content:
690: :label: lem-reg-fourth-chain
691: 
692: For $h(x) = \sigma'_{\text{reg}}(V(x))$ where $V(x) = \sigma^2_\rho[f_k, d, x]$, the fourth derivative is:
693: 
694: $$
695: \begin{align}
696: \nabla^4 h = \,&(\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(4)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 4} + 6 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(3)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 2} \otimes \nabla^2 V \\
697: &+ 3 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot (\nabla^2 V)^{\otimes 2} + 4 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot \nabla V \otimes \nabla^3 V \\
698: &+ (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(1)}(V) \cdot \nabla^4 V
699: \end{align}
700: 
701: $$
702: 
703: **Norm bound:**
704: 
705: $$
706: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{6 \cdot 3}{8\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{4}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
707: 
708: $$
709: 
710: Simplifying:
711: 
712: $$
713: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{9}{4\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{1}{\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
714:

items.raw_directive:
687: ## 6. Fourth Derivative Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation
688: 
689: :::{prf:lemma} Chain Rule for $\sigma'_{\text{reg}}$
690: :label: lem-reg-fourth-chain
691: 
692: For $h(x) = \sigma'_{\text{reg}}(V(x))$ where $V(x) = \sigma^2_\rho[f_k, d, x]$, the fourth derivative is:
693: 
694: $$
695: \begin{align}
696: \nabla^4 h = \,&(\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(4)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 4} + 6 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(3)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 2} \otimes \nabla^2 V \\
697: &+ 3 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot (\nabla^2 V)^{\otimes 2} + 4 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot \nabla V \otimes \nabla^3 V \\
698: &+ (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(1)}(V) \cdot \nabla^4 V
699: \end{align}
700: 
701: $$
702: 
703: **Norm bound:**
704: 
705: $$
706: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{6 \cdot 3}{8\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{4}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
707: 
708: $$
709: 
710: Simplifying:
711: 
712: $$
713: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{9}{4\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{1}{\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
714: 
715: $$
